courses.name: JavaScript
courses.description: A widely used coding language that helps to add functionality and interactivity to your web app or website.

courses.name: Python
courses.description: It is a high-level coding language that runs on lots of platforms. It is popular because of its simplicity and emphasis on clear syntax.

courses.name: PHP
courses.description: PHP serves as the link between the database (which stores data produced to your web app or website), and the HTML that displays the stored data.

courses.name: C++
courses.description: It is an updated and enhanced version of the C coding language. It included object-orientation to C, hence the reason it is called C++. Majority of computer games are written in this language.

courses.name: Ruby
courses.description: A high level coding language that is quite fun to write! It is popularly known through the Ruby on Rails framework.

courses.name: SQL
courses.description: SQL is the acronym for 'Structured Query Language'. It is used to insert data into a database, and interact with such data. SQL 'codes' are called 'queries'. With the queries, one can create, read, update, view, and delete data in the database.
